mapper.select: select * from STAYPC_NOTICE order by list_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into STAYPC_NOTICE(list_no, subject, content, id, register_datetime) values((select nvl(max(list_no),1)+1 from STAYPC_NOTICE),#{subject},#{content},#{id},sysdate)
mapper.update: update STAYPC_NOTICE set CONTENT=#{content}, subject=#{subject} where list_no=#{list_no}
